entry.title: ATG700 - Scotch 3M Scotch ATG adhesive applicator
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Applicators
Price: 61.42

[shortdesc]

Scotch ATG Adhesive Applicator, 700, 1/2 in (1.25 cm) and 3/4 in (2 cm) wide rolls

  • Scotch ATG 700 Adhesive Applicator is a yellow adhesive applicator for use with Scotch ATG Tape 1/2 inch or 3/4 inch wide rolls.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Specifications

    Brand 3M
    Line Scotch
    Color Yellow
    Origin Country China
    Product Type Applicators

    Extra Product Information

  • This Scotch ATG Adhesive Applicator features covered gears that minimize applicator jams
  • The transparent cover shows remaining tape
  • and holds up to 60 yd (55m) of Scotch ATG Tapes
  • This ATG adhesive transfer tape is a utility grade tape for use wi

    • Product Information

  • Applies adhesive transfer tape while simultaneously removing and rewinding the liner
  • Touch of the finger triggers quick, controlled application of tape
  • ATG tape system delivers a controlled application of the adhesive while the liner rewinds into the ATG applicator
  • Bonds on contact, and works on a variety of substrate or material combinations
  • ATG tape system is versatile, convenient, quick and easy to use
  • No mess or clean up
  • Cost effective replacement to rivets, staples, screws, bolts, liquid adhesives
  • Safer than hot melt adhesives

    • Suggested Application

  • This is good for binding, adhering, joining, affixing, bonding, mounting, holding, and attaching
  • Also good for recouperage, paper converting, core starting, thin flexible materials and end tabbing
  • General industrial assembly, point-of-purchase POP, displ
    		•

entry.title: 3M Scotch S-634 - Scotch Filament Tape Sealer S634 3/4 Inch 7100010453
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Applicators
Price: 1674.56

[shortdesc]

Scotch Filament Tape Box Sealer S634, 3/4 in, 1 per case

  • Scotch® Filament Tape Box Sealer S634 is a semi-automatic filament tape dispenser capable of applying a 4-inch L-clip of Scotch® tape with legs of equal length
  • It applies tape widths of 3/8” to 3/4 Inch (9-18mm) from a 3” core and provides an ideal L-clip taping solution for small- to mid-sized product boxes.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Line Scotch
    Width 3/4 Inch
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Applicators

    Extra Product Information

  • Optimize Boxing Operations Our Scotch® Filament Tape Box Sealer S634 provides a solution for packaging applications that require repetitive deployment of Scotch® tape L-clips in order to secure product boxes
  • The box itself can be operated on a table top

    • Product Information

  • Semi-automatic dispenser for use with Scotch® High Strength Filament Tapes Applies L-Clip of tape to a box using filament or light duty tapes Box uses self-lubricated bearings, so no routine lubrication is required

    • Suggested Application

  • Primary package sealing Small box sealing Non-RSC box sealing
    		•
